page.text: The interplanetary reactor could be removed from its mountings with a bit of work.

You take the time to analyse the device so you can reproduce the reactor later on. But you realize you lack the skill to reproduce it currently. Nonetheless you lever the reactor you do have out of its mountings and can now take it with you
